EmailTemplate.subject: A practical step to a modern store (you saw it at NRF)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Unlock {{company.Company Name:default=your store}}'s true potential with a software-defined approach <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/software-defined-store/unlock-potential]]> At NRF, we talked about our next-gen retail store architecture, and the possibility of modernizing {{company.Company Name:default=your store}} without ditching your IT investments. The cornerstone of this is store virtualization. (Just a fancy name for moving the software off each edge device and onto a store server, where you can control your whole store as a single touch-point.) Here’s a simple way to think about it <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/software-defined-store/unlock-potential]]>.
